features: Versatile and cordless for whole-home deep cleaning.
60% more power.¹ 60 minutes of run time.²
Power trigger helps maximize energy efficiency, only using power where you need it.
LCD screen shows power modes, maintenance alerts, and remaining run time to the second. Has 3 cleaning modes for the right power where you need it.
Motorbar cleaner head deep cleans all floor types. De-tangles wrapped long hair and pet hair as you clean.
Converts to a handheld vacuum for cleaning cars, stairs, and upholstery.
The Hair screw tool sucks up long hair and pet hair. Fast. Its anti-tangle conical brush bar removes long hair and pet hair from pet beds, car seats, stairs, and more.
Comes with 7 Dyson-engineered accessories to clean up high, down low, and everywhere in between.
Advanced whole-machine filtration traps 99.99% of particles as small as 0.3 microns.³ Expels cleaner air.
Made from strong materials selected for their durability and lightweight properties. With a 2-year warranty and lifetime Dyson support.
body.description: The Dyson V11 Plus cordless vacuum is engineered with the power, versatility, and run time to deep clean homes with pets. An LCD screen displays the run time countdown to the second, as well as the power mode and maintenance alerts. Dyson’s de-tangling Motorbar™ cleaner head deep cleans carpets and hard floors. With hair removal vanes that clear long hair and pet hair from the brush bar as you clean. The innovative Hair screw tool with a conical brush bar is perfect for cleaning upholstery and pet beds. The Dyson V11 Plus has advanced, whole-machine filtration that captures fine dust and expels cleaner air. Its versatile cordless format transforms into a handheld vacuum with one click so you can clean up high, down low, and everywhere in between with three cleaning modes for the right power where you need it. Comes with a 2-year warranty and lifetime Dyson support.¹Compared to the Dyson V8™.²Actual runtime will vary based on power mode, dust level, floor type and/or attachments used.³In Boost mode. All other modes achieve at least 99.97% filtration.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 60% more powerful suction​ The Dyson Hyperdymium motor spins at up to 125,000rpm to generate 60% more power than the Dyson V8. It provides up to 60 minutes of run time.² De-tangling Motorbar cleaner head​ Sucks up long hair and pet hair quickly from all floor types. Automatically de-tangles wrapped hair as you clean. Deep cleans carpets and removes dust and debris from hard floors. Motor-driven cleaning in small spaces​ The Dyson Hair screw tool sucks up long hair and pet hair without tangling. Motor-driven cleaning for upholstery, pet beds, stairs, cars, and more.
LCD screen Shows current performance, including selected power mode, remaining run time, filter maintenance reminders, and blockage reports for complete control over your clean.
Cleans everywhere Converts to a handheld vacuum to clean cars, stairs, pet beds, upholstery, and more.

Features Deep clean all floor types Stiff nylon bristles drive into carpets to capture deep-down dirt, and anti-static carbon fiber filaments release fine dust from hard floors. De-tangles as you clean De-tangling vanes automatically clear wrapped long hair and pet hair from the brush bar as you clean. Hygienic bin emptying The 0.2 gallon bin has a hygienic ejection mechanism that drives out dust in a single action. Easy charging and storage The Dyson V11 Plus drops into the wall-mounted dock, which charges and tidily stores tools. Ready to grab and go.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The iPhone of vacuum cleaners
reviews.reviewText: Very surprised by how well thought and functional this vacuum is. It's light and ergonomic. Cleaning it works as a charm, as the chamber holding the trash is propelled out from filter, so one doesn't need to put one's hands inside the chamber to empty it. It's super convenient to clean the stairs now. In fact, cleaning is very easy anywhere, as one just grabs the vacuum, clean what need to be cleaned, and it's finished. The suction power is very good for cleaning fluffy rugs too. Attaching and detaching accessories is very easy. Extremely well thought. This product is a game changer to me. I haven't even used my robot vacuums in a while.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My honest true review
reviews.reviewText: Who doesn't love Dyson? I have wanted a wire free Dyson vacuum for a long time. It does a wonderful job vacuuming. I have mostly hardwood floors and a few rugs. It is amazing to use on the wood floors. It picks up everything including dog hair. On the rugs it makes them look clean and vacuumed. I love all of the attachments it comes with. It is light weight and easy to maneuver. I am 56 years old and not in the best condition, so when I say it is light weight and easy to maneuver, I am being honest. I can vacuum the house much quicker since there is no cord to fight with or having to change electric outlets because the cord wont stretch throughout the entire house. I hate to vacuum, but this Dyson makes it enjoyable and a quick, easy chore to accomplish. I have not ran out of battery power while vacuuming. I have a 1600 square foot home and I have yet to run out of power before I am finished vacuuming the house.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Dyson V11 Cordless Stick Vacuum: A Freedom-Loving
reviews.reviewText: The Dyson V11 is a cordless game-changer. Its powerful suction, agile handling, and tech-savvy features make it a joy to use. While the price might sting, the convenience, performance, and overall cleaning experience make it a worthy investment for those who value top-notch cordless cleaning. Just remember, freedom comes with a price (and maybe a little muscle work).P.S. If you're a pet owner, the V11's hair-busting prowess is worth celebrating in a victory dance!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Winner! This is the one! Get it!
reviews.reviewText: Purchased December 2023, for about $400 through Amazon (Dyson's website had the same holiday price). I didn't initially want to spend this much money on a vacuum but we have little kids, and use the vacuum a lot, so I'm glad we got a quality vacuum that works for us. Totally worth it!We did a lot of research and finally landed on the Dyson V11 Cordless Stick Vaccum. We previously had a stand up Shark pet pro vacuum but this blows that out of the water!! We vacuumed areas that have been previously vacuumed with the other vacuum but the dyson picked up SO MUCH DUST/DIRT! Where was all that dirt hiding??! 👀 The vacuum has a little weight to it, but even with a fractured arm, I'm still able to maneuver it a little awkwardly with a bit of extra support. Be aware that you have to hold the power button down the entire time while you vacuum- there is no just "on" switch. This is to conserve battery life. As soon as you finger comes off the trigger, power goes off. The switch doesn't require tons of pressure so I'm not sure why people are complaining about their hands hurting from holding the button. 🤷🏼‍♀️ My nearly 4 year old can hold the vacuum, power button down and maneuver it on his own (not as fast or agile as an adult, but by himself nonetheless)- if that gives you an idea for weight. The suction is powerful and has several levels to pick from that affect the battery life (which will show you on a digital display how much run time you have based on the level of suction power you select) , emptying the dustbin is easy. And with the vacuum being cordless my husband is even excited to vacuum now! If you're on the fence- spend the money, make your life a little easier and get something quality that will do a great job cleaning and last a long time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Compared to my Shark
reviews.reviewText: The Dyson is the Cadillac of vacuum cleaners. It had great suction and does the job. I have a shark and I like it better. It has a larger dust bin, is foldable, it has an on/off switch and an extra power button. With the Dyson, you have to squeeze the trigger to keep it going. Dyson has a little better suction but the Shark is the better bang for your buck.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have 2 and bought one for my mom. Powerful suction. On max suction it vacuums about 30 minutes. So light and easy to maneuver. I have a yellow lab, a Weimaraner and a long haired lynx point cat. Works well for pet hair. Hand attachment is perfect for furniture.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars What's not to like . It's a Dyson.
reviews.reviewText: Great suction, long lasting battery, light weight. We have 2 English mastiffs and my wife vacuums constantly . The last one broke only because she dropped it about 100 times trying to prop it up on the wall when not in use (it does not stand by itself). The motor never quit and battery was still fine; just the plastic connector to the canister finally broke. For this new one, I installed the wall charger in the closet , which acts as a vacuum hanger for storage as well, so I don't see why this one won't last 10 years.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars If you have children and/or pets, you NEED this vacuum!
reviews.reviewText: To start, I always buy $120 off brand cordless vacuums from Amazon that die after 1 year. They work fine, but I always find myself annoyed when they don’t last. I told myself that if it happened again, I was shelling out the money for a Dyson because I want longevity and function.This did not disappoint! I have 2 shedding cats and 2 messy little boys who keep me vacuuming at a minimum of 2x per day, most days more. So vacuuming is VERY important to me and I need something good.Immediately I was disappointed that the v11 doesn’t have a light feature so you can see all the dust, as well as the fact that I have to hold down the power button to make it work, but those things weren’t deal breakers because the canister was full after one go-round in my son’s room (that I vacuum every day!) I was disgusted and amazed at the suction power and all the dust and ick that it collected, I didn’t care about what I was missing (that you can have if you pay $200 more.)The power of this vacuum is truly amazing, I am so so pleased I bought it. I have had to empty the canister several times because there was so much dust in the rooms that my Amazon vacuum wasn’t collecting. Off brand just doesn’t compare.You won’t regret this purchase.

Excellent quality, very thrilled with product, easy to empty bin, hair and string does not get tangled around beater bar. My only complaint, Dysun should consider adding a button to keep vacuum on so users don’t have to continually hold down the on button
Es un gran producto. Cumple con lo que promete y a un buen precio
Es tal cual la descripción. Ha sido toda la diferencia en mi casa.

Our V11 worked great for 1 month, and then the motor gave out. Lost 90% of its suction and just pushed the dirt around for a few days and then just wouldn’t turn on any more. We were always diligent with emptying the canister and making sure the filter wasn’t clogged, but the vacuum gave out after only a month anyway. Very disappointed. The only reason we spent the extra money on this was because the advertising led us to believe that Dyson was the best you could get and would never lose suction-definitely not the case!
